week.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a period of seven days and nights, usually measured in Britain from Monday to Sunday and in the US from Sunday to Saturday
week.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I can’t see you this week.
Letters were delivered twice a week only.
week.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: any period of seven days and nights
week.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: It will cost you an estimated £10 per week to feed one dog.
The training program lasts three weeks.
I’ve been living here for six weeks.
If he hasn’t phoned in a week, I’ll phone him.
week.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the part of the week when you go to work, usually from Monday to Friday
week.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: I don’t see her during the week.
week.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: He’ll be in the office this week, so you should give him a call.
Last week, my washing machine broke down.
Five soldiers were killed in the past week alone.
She thought about what a colleague had said to her the previous week.
She booked another appointment for the following week.
I can’t believe we’ve been here a whole week already.
Friday is our busiest day of the week.
week.translation[0].note_box[1].heading: GRAMMAR: Patterns with week
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[0]: Don’t use in with these words
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[1]: I saw her in last week
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[2]: I’m going to be busy at work this week
I’m going to be busy at work in this week
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[3]: Shall we meet for lunch next week?
Shall we meet for lunch in next week?
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[4]: He was sick in that week
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[5]: You use a week when saying how many times in a week something happens
We have four English lessons a week
We have four English lessons in a week
week.translation[0].note_box[1].items[6]: You use all week when talking about something that happens during every part of a week
We had good weather all week
We had good weather all the week
